{"city": "Brentwood", "state": "CA", "name": "Community Produce Program", "address": "218 Pine St,", "phone": "925-382-9967", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food Brentwood Printer Friendly List Community Produce Program Families and individuals can pick up to 20 pounds of FREE fresh produce twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Brentwood Community United Methodist Church , 218 Pine St, Brentwood , 2nd & 4th Tuesday 4:00-5:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Immaculate Heart of Mary Church , 500 Fairview Ave, Brentwood , 2nd & 4th Tuesday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. The Dwelling Place Church , 90 Village Dr, Brentwood , 1st & 3rd Sunday 3:00-4:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Brentwood Community United Methodist Church- Hope House , 218 Pine St, Brentwood , Monday & Wednesday 9:00-11:30am.
							If you would like to reach out by email: hhouse.umc@gmail.com Phone: 925-382-9967 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Immaculate Heart of Mary Church (SVdP) , 500 Fairview Ave, Brentwood , Friday 11:00am-12:00pm.
							Only serves Brentwood, Bethel Island, and Knightson residents. ID required. Registration starts at 9:00am. Bring ID. Phone: 925-634-4154 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Power for Living Ministries (Drive-Thru), 6830 Lone Tree Way, Brentwood , Friday 12:00pm – open until all food or supplies are given out. Phone: (925) 418-1418 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Seed of Faith Church , 605 Harvest Park Dr, Brentwood , Tuesday 10:00am-12:00pm
2nd & 4th Saturday 10:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 925-513-2970 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Support Life Foundation: Brentwood (Drive-Thru), 7701 Lone Tree Way, Brentwood , Friday 10:30-11:15am.
							Clients must register before attending distribution. Please copy & paste this link into your search bar: https://supportlives.org/get-yana Phone: 510-541-6293 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Brentwood Senior Center (Drive-Thru), 193 Griffith Ln, Brentwood , 2nd & 4th Thursday 10:00-11:00am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
Fairfield, CA 94533 GET HELP Find Food CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Contact Us 855-309-FOOD (3663) info@foodbankccs.org How to Help Ways to Give Donate Food Volunteer Advocate Become a Partner Agency Food Bank Updates Blog Events Newsroom Newsletter Sign-up Careers Facebook Twitter Youtube Instagram Linkedin 501(c)(3) Organization | Federal Tax ID# 94-2418054 Copyright © 2025 Cookie Settings This institution is an equal opportunity provider | Site Map | Privacy Policy Website Design and Development by MIGHTYminnow", "latitude": 37.934925643697, "longitude": -121.69591368255, "source": "food_bank_of_contra_costa_and_solano_ca", "food_bank": "Food Bank of Contra Costa and Solano"}
